attributes.title: About why trump shouldn’t be president
attributes.review: I don’t like trump because he rapes kids and he’s racist and a hot Cheeto man and he uses racial slurs towards everyone and he’s more attracted to his own daughter than his wife and he’s a monster.

attributes.title: Annoying Orange but irl
attributes.review: Download the app just to see what It was all about. Next thing I know Mike Pence has replaced the monster under my bed. He won’t go home. 1 Star for making me uncomfy 👁👄👁

attributes.title: What a terrible app
attributes.review: I was drinking mayonnaise by the liter when I opened this app and started choking because I saw a picture of voldemort and all his death eaters. How offensive !! This app should be banned from this country

attributes.title: The Worst App Known To Planet Earth...
attributes.review: This app is a big no for me, it’s worthless it has no point to be on the app store or anywhere else Donald Trump should’ve never been president in the first place...don’t take TikTok down 🥺

attributes.title: The worst app, should be removed
attributes.review: Hprrible app made my phone crash should be disabled from appstore, full of racism and nazi ideology this is a horrible app don’t install it will crash your IOS

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: Once I opened the app the cops showed up to my house and beat me till I couldn’t move! Trump also came by and threw up on my dog and did a race against my turtle. The turtle won though so I got to live.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: I opened the app and immediately got ads every 4 seconds! My phone began to slow down and a virus was later discovered. This app is not secure!
